comment.text: This translation key is used for a button or dialog title that instructs users to follow the actions of administrators when changing portal ownership. In this context, it appears in a ChangePortalOwnerDialog component, likely on a "Change Owner" button or similar UI element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Administratorlarla da eyni şeyi edin" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "Do the same as administrators." It's a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning as smoothly. A more natural phrasing would imply performing the same actions or having the same permissions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Administratorlar kimi elə et" (Do it like administrators) or "Administratorlar edən kimi et" (Do as the administrators do) or "Administratorlar edir, elə də et." (Do as administrators do).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Изпълнявайте същата дейност като администраторите" is too literal and doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Do the same as administrators.' It implies performing the same *activity*, whereas the original phrase refers to having the same permissions or role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поведението да е същото като на администраторите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Արեք նույնը, ինչ ադմինիստրատորները' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Գործեք նույնը, ինչպես ադմինիստրատորները'.

ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fai lo stesso come gli amministratori

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "관리자와 동일" is a literal translation but lacks the implied action from the English phrase "Do the same as administrators." It simply states 'same as administrators' without the action of 'doing'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 관리자와 같이 수행하다 (Gwanrija-wa goti suhaeng-hada) - To perform as administrators, or 관리자처럼 (Gwanrija-cheoreom) - Like administrators.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Faça o mesmo como administrador' is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally in Portuguese. 'Como' isn't the best preposition to use in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Faça o mesmo que os administradores

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Faceţi aceleaşi lucruri ca și administratori" is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. "Faceţi la fel ca administratorii" or "Urmați exemplul administratorilor" would be more idiomatic.

The translation 'පරිපාලකයින් ලෙසම කරන්න' while literally meaning 'do as administrators', doesn't fully convey the nuance of 'Do the same as administrators'. It suggests mimicking, rather than performing the identical action. A more accurate translation would convey the sense of mirroring the actions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'පරිපාලකයින් කරනවා විධිහම කළ යුතුය' (Paripaalakinakara nawawa widihama kalaayamaeyaa) which translates to 'should do in the same way as administrators'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Учини исто као администратори' while grammatically correct, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Do the same as administrators.'  It's a bit literal and could be improved to reflect the intended meaning of mimicking or replicating the actions of administrators.

The translation 'Učini isto kao administratori' while understandable, isn't the most natural way to express 'Do the same as administrators' in Serbian. 'Radi isto kao administratori' or 'Ispuni isto kao administratori' would be more idiomatic.

The translation 'Yöneticilerle aynı şeyi yap' while literal, doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Do the same as administrators'. It can be interpreted as 'do the same *with* administrators' rather than 'do the same *as* administrators'.
